work.title: Software Development Internship
work.description: Designed and implemented a dashboard to show client specific data in the application using Angular, C#, MS-SQL and Wijmo.I have also worked on the front-end development of the application using Angular, Typescript.I have been involved in the build and release process of the application using Microsoft Azure Devops.

work.title: Graduate Research Assistant
work.description: Assisting Professor in developing a live project on CVCL(Collaborative Virtual Lab Environment).Responsible for end to end design and enhancement of open source on Unbuntu server and maintaining data in MySQL Database.Technologies Used: HTML, CSS, JSP, Java Script and MySQL.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
